technology.title: Phones were fashionable again in 2025 - The Verge

technology.title: Semi-solid state MagSafe power banks arrive from the founder of Hyper - The Verge

technology.description: WatchGuard fixed CVE-2025-14733, a critical Fireware OS VPN flaw with CVSS 9.3 that is actively exploited in the wild.

technology.title: This Chrome Extension Turns LinkedIn Posts About AI Into Facts About Allen Iverson - WIRED
technology.description: The developers of a browser tool that changes AI-centric LinkedIn posts to Allen Iverson facts want to help “take back control of your experience of the internet.”

business.description: Don't get swindled while buying those last-minute gifts. Amy Nofziger, a fraud specialist with AARP, shares top schemes she's been seeing this season — and tips on how to protect yourself.

business.description: One of Point72 Asset Management’s star traders is leaving to launch his own hedge fund and has secured the largest initial backing the firm has ever granted to a departing trader.
